Pre-Game Insights: Burke was designated for assignment by the Rangers on Aug. 11
Burke was claimed by the Los Angeles Angels a few days later
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burke allowed an infield hit from Marcus Semien in the eighth, but struck out Wyatt Langford on three pitches, and got Josh Jung to ground into an inning-ending 6-4-3 double play
Others: Burke was acquired in December 2018 in a three-team trade between the Oakland Athletics, Tampa Bay Rays, and the Rangers
Since joining the Angels, Burke is 1-1 with a 2.45 ERA and 18 strikeouts in 11 innings
